meanings.definition: Relating to the branch of genetics that deals with the study of the structure and function of chromosomes.
meanings.sent1: The cytogenetical research focused on understanding how chromosomes work.
meanings.sent2: Scientists use cytogenetical techniques to examine chromosome abnormalities.
meanings.sent3: The cytogenetical puzzle was so tricky that even the smartest scientists were stumped.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a cytogenetical map, each thought a chromosome waiting to be decoded.
meanings.sent5: The cytogenetical patterns were as intricate as a spider's web, revealing hidden secrets of life.
